LanguageData.VV_GrapefruitTree.description: A citrus tree that produces large, tangy fruits with a slightly bitter taste. Grapefruit trees thrive in warm, sunny climates and require well-drained soil.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Grapefruit trees will grow 30% faster if temperature is between 37 and 60 ºC.
LanguageData.VV_LimeTree.description: A small tree that produces sour, juicy limes. Thrives in warm climates and is often used in cooking and beverages.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Lime trees will grow 30% faster if temperature is between 37 and 60 ºC.
